name: New Vista
description: Mental health and substance use services organization that assists individuals and families in the enhancement of their emotional, mental and physical well-being through behavioral health, substance use, intellectual and developmental disability and primary care services. Serves children and adults in 17 Central Kentucky counties with comprehensive mental health and crisis services.
source: Verified from official website and contact information
hours_of_operation: 24-Hour Helpline available, office hours vary by location
eligibility_requirements: Serves residents of 17 Central Kentucky counties, accepts most insurance and offers sliding scale fees
populations_served: Children and adults in Central Kentucky, individuals with mental health needs, substance use disorders, developmental disabilities
cost_information: Accepts most insurance, sliding scale fees available, some services may be free
languages_available: English, Spanish, Arabic, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2024-01-15. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from official website https://newvista.org/. Phone number (800) 928-8000 confirmed as 24-Hour Helpline. Website verified current and accessible. Address: 1351 Newtown Pike, Building 1, Lexington, KY 40511 confirmed. Founded in 1965, serves 17 Central Kentucky counties: Anderson, Bourbon, Boyle, Clark, Estill, Fayette, Franklin, Hardin, Harrison, Jessamine, Lincoln, Madison, Powell, Scott, and others. Provides mental health, substance use, developmental services, emergency services, and primary care.
